mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (subject, content, regDate, updateDate, memberIdx) VALUES (#{subject}, #{content}, now(), now(), #{memberIdx})
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET hit = hit + 1 WHERE noticeIdx=#{noticeIdx}
mapper.delete: UPDATE notice SET isDelete = 1 WHERE noticeIdx=#{noticeIdx}
mapper.select:
SELECT * from notice WHERE isDelete = 0
AND subject LIKE '%${subject}%'
AND content LIKE '%${content}%'
AND memberIdx = ${memberIdx}
